sentences.chinese: 这些情况预示著要有灾祸。

sentences.english: China-ASEAN relations have withstood the test of crises and disasters.
sentences.chinese: 中国和东盟的关系经受住了风雨灾祸的考验。

sentences.english: But whoso hearkeneth unto me shall dwell safely, and shall be quiet from fear of evil.
sentences.chinese: 惟有听从我的，必安然居住，得享安静，不怕灾祸。

sentences.english: And there were slain four and twenty thousand men.
sentences.chinese: 在这次灾祸内，死去了二万四千人。

sentences.english: Open not your door when the devil knock.
sentences.chinese: 魔鬼敲门慎莫开，开门必有灾祸来。

sentences.english: The fighting was so heavy that the Benjamites did not realize how near disaster was.
sentences.chinese: 便雅悯人却不知道灾祸临近了。

sentences.english: The blessing of the Lord is upon the head of the just: but iniquity covereth the mouth of the wicked.
sentences.chinese: 上主的祝福在义人头上，灾祸却使恶人哑口无言。

sentences.english: He that rendereth evil for good, evil shall not depart from his house.
sentences.chinese: 谁以怨报德，灾祸必不离开他的家。

sentences.english: The same power that brought curses on Egypt could bring health to Israel.
sentences.chinese: 那带给埃及灾祸的能力，却给以色列人带来福乐。

sentences.english: We do not know what led to the disaster nor who inflicted it.
sentences.chinese: 我们不知道灾祸从何而起，也不知道肇事者是谁。

sentences.english: shall there be evil in a city, and the LORD hath not done it?
sentences.chinese: 灾祸若临到一城，岂非耶和华所降的吗。
灾祸是福，塞翁失马焉知非福。

sentences.english: Swilla explained what misfortune had forced her to come to Mos Eisley.
sentences.chinese: 斯薇拉诉说了那场将她赶到莫斯埃斯利的灾祸。

sentences.english: But when it is a matter of baobabs , that always means a catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 但是有关巴尔巴巨树的话，就意味将酝酿成灾祸了。

sentences.english: Owen thought he could see Cowperwood's approaching doom quite plainly.
sentences.chinese: 奥文认为他能够很明白地看出柯帕乌迫在眉睫的灾祸。

sentences.english: I called for a variety of evil, I in yellow suffocated to death in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 我召来种种灾祸，我在黄沙血水中窒息而死。

definition: variant of 厄運|厄运[e4 yun4]
fateful accident/inauspicious matter (involving death or casualties)
